post.content:
Good Reference in Korea.
   : Well-Known companies (LG, Samsung), If you have reference from such a company, you will not be asked for reference in any job market.  What if you have a good reference in Korea ,and  one company ask you for reference , they can email or call them to check your reference. Do not think that no one calls one of your ex-coworkers on your reference!!!
If you do not have it, find someone to be your good reference in Korea.
2. Enough communication ability in English
  : There are some levels to evaluate Someone's English ability.
    If you do not have  any problem to explain in English what you think and what you write to someone you do not know, I do not think that you need to worry about your English ability.
3. Required skills in Job Market
  : This one is really related to the second Item.
  Sometimes, Over 10 years working experience in C++  does not work.
  If you have real working experience with the skill set what companies in Canada wants, you will get better opportunity rather than someone just  having over 10 years programming experience.

Do not afraid of trying something you want!!!
Once you think something, you are just close enough to your final goal.
